sys_hub_flow.name: (OLD) UTIL_SyncComputer

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: We want to do this BEFORE the push because we might be told by Armis that the existing Armis data is API-based, which will affect whether we push.

sys_variable_value.value: force an API query and we haven't done one in the linking process

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: document the successful push by grabbing the current contents of Armis

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: ensures that we have a MAC in the crossref table if at all possible. If we can't, we scrub the operation.

sys_variable_value.value: we have a record with a MAC

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Document the current time (as the last push)

sys_variable_value.value: allowed to write to Armis and source!=Armis

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: ensures that we have a MAC in the crossref table if at all possible. If we can't, we scrub the operation.

sys_variable_value.value: we have a record with a MAC

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Document the current time (as the last push)

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: We want to do this BEFORE the push because we might be told by Armis that the existing Armis data is API-based, which will affect whether we push.

sys_variable_value.value: force an API query and we haven't done one in the linking process

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: document the successful push by grabbing the current contents of Armis

sys_variable_value.value: allowed to write to Armis and source!=Armis
